nl.uu.cs.aplib.mainConcepts
This package provides classes that form the main concepts of the aplib agent-programming.

    GoalStructure
    AplibEDSL.WHILE​(Predicate<AgentState> g, GoalStructure subgoal)
    WHILE(a,p,G) will repeatedly try G, while p is true.
